name: Village of Origins
storyline: Imagine waking up to a body that is not your own, confused and disoriented, you soon discover that your body was stolen by a trickster spirit to interact with matter. Your soul, now untethered, is free to take control of an expansive army, switching freely, to reclaim your body.
summary: Village of Origins is an RTS / RPG hybrid with a focus on switching between host bodies to solve puzzles and engage in combat. The world consists of 4 parallel realms: The Mountains, The Isles, The Castle, The City.
